feature: All stories related to managing projects, tracking tasks, and scheduling.
details: These stories are grouped together as they all focus on functionalities that help users manage their tasks and projects effectively, including creating timelines, tracking progress, and scheduling lectures.

feature: All stories related to creating, categorizing, and searching notes.
details: These stories are grouped together as they focus on functionalities that enhance the organization and retrieval of notes, allowing users to create personal notes, categorize them, and search efficiently.

feature: Advanced data analysis for lecturers to monitor productivity and engagement.
details: This story stands alone as it focuses on providing advanced data analysis capabilities specifically for lecturers, which is distinct from the other user stories.

feature: Customization of user profiles with gamification elements.
details: This story is focused on allowing users to customize their profiles with rewards, which ties into the gamification strategy to enhance user engagement.
